text: SLIGHTLY BETTER CHECKPOINTS Pause modifying txns while the DBMS takes the checkpoint. — Prevent queries from acquiring write latch on table/index pages. — Don't have to wait until all txns finish before taking the checkpoint. — EZCMU-D8 v 4 4 4 » PI % 39:43/1:18:06 - SLIGHTLY BETTER CHECKPOINTS > © & (— |=î N 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
